name: JLM Partners
tag_list: public-relations, corporate-communications, mobile, cable, wireless, consumer-electronics, consulting
overview:
JLM is a boutique corporate communications firm serving clients in the cable, wireless, consumer electronics, and digital media sectors.

Collectively, our staff have served in strategic communications roles with the National Cable & Telecommunications Association, AT&T Wireless/Cingular, Cable in the Classroom, Nortel, RealNetworks, Siemens, and others.

Over the years, JLM has advised a wide range of clients including Amazon.com, Cisco, C-COR, Clearwire, Hillcrest Laboratories, Motorola, RealNetworks and other technology leaders. We take only a limited number of clients in order to insure that we deliver what we promise â€“ the full time involvement of our senior people.
